Title: LG Launches 4K Surgical Monitor With Intelligent Features To Optimize Surgical Workflow
Summary: , Sep. 11, 2025 â€” LG Electronics (LG) is launching its new 31.5-inch 4K surgical monitor, model 32HS710S. Designed to streamline surgical workflow, the monitor combines crisp 4K resolution (3,840 x 2,160) image quality with intelligent new features that prioritize user convenience and operational efficiency. The monitor has received 510(k) clearance from the U.S. FDA, indicating it can now be sold in the U.S.
